com.enremmeta.rtb.caches

Class AdCache

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.enremmeta.rtb.caches.AdCache
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Runnable

    public class AdCache
extends Object
implements Runnable

    This is a scheduled process that, on waking up, well, runs -- see that method for more info.

    Author:
    Gregory Golberg (grisha@alum.mit.edu)

    Copyright Â© Enremmeta LLC 2015. All Rights Reserved.

      • setStatus

      • doRun

        public String doRun(boolean scheduled)

        Ad cache refresh

        This method is run every minute. It can also be forced explicitly to run, usually in the debug phase. We do guarantee, however, that only one instance of this method is running. It goes through a number of housekeeping tasks.

        Ad refresh

        This is one of the main tasks. It does the following:

        Refresh ads

        This only runs every ttl minutes. It goes through the following steps:
        Parameters:
        scheduled - whether the run was scheduled or explicit (say, via invocation from AdminSvc.refreshAdCache(javax.ws.rs.container.AsyncResponse, String)).
        Returns:
        log messages to print (in case of explicit invocation).

      • run

        public void run()
        Same as doRun(true)
        Specified by:
        run in interface Runnable
        See Also:
        doRun(boolean)
